name: Construct 3 Platformer Tutorial
description:
A game made for the Construct 3 Platformer tutorial series. 

The source code is also included, and can be opened in Construct 3.

Assets used:

https://bigbuckbunny.itch.io/platform-assets-pack?download

https://soundsbydane.itch.io/8-bit-sound-pack?download
